last_episode_to_air.name: Promise
last_episode_to_air.overview: Daigo is saved by the chief, who sets up a special task force in Kuge Village.

name: Gannibal
overview: After causing a major incident, police officer Daigo Agawa takes his wife and daughter to live in the remote mountain village of Kuge. It seems the perfect place to recover from the ordeal, despite the mysterious disappearance of a previous officer posted there. One day, the body of an old woman is found on the mountain. The Goto family says she was attacked by a bear, but Daigo notices a human bite mark. It soon becomes clear that not all is as it seems in the village.
tagline: In this village, you will be eaten alive.

episodes.name: Offering of Flowers
episodes.overview: Daigo inspects the corpse of a supposed victim of a bear attack but finds something troubling.

episodes.name: Attack
episodes.overview: Daigo runs into Gin’s funeral procession and witnesses a shocking accusation.

episodes.name: Fatal Bullet
episodes.overview: Daigo wakes up in the hospital, but danger looms.

episodes.name: Line of Sight
episodes.overview: With the Kano case solved, village life is peaceful for the Agawas at least for now.

episodes.name: Trace
episodes.overview: Daigo is introduced to Utada, who sheds more light on Kano’s death and the Kuge Village.

episodes.name: Premonition
episodes.overview: Daigo discovers that Gin Goto suffered from symptoms similar to kuru disease before her death.

episodes.name: Promise
episodes.overview: Daigo is saved by the chief, who sets up a special task force in Kuge Village.
